definition: ardent/intense/fierce/stern/upright/to give one's life for a noble cause/exploits/achievements
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

pinyin: gao1 neng2 lie4 xing4 zha4 yao4

sentences.english: Their drug of choice was a potent intoxicant they called hashish.
sentences.chinese: 他們選擇的是一種他們稱爲“黑煞”的烈性麻醉劑。

sentences.english: Judy Garland, he recalls, was also fond of a tipple(9).
sentences.chinese: 據他回憶，茱蒂嘉蘭也很喜歡烈性葡萄酒。

sentences.english: LCBO stores are generally the only stores allowed to sell hard liquor in Ontario.
sentences.chinese: LCBO商店是安大略省唯一允許賣烈性酒的地方。

sentences.english: They blew the door off with a small charge of high explosive.
sentences.chinese: 他們裝了一小包烈性炸藥把門炸掉了。

sentences.english: Becoming tetranitro pentaerythritol responsed with the nitric acid and is high explosive.
sentences.chinese: 與硝酸反應生成四硝基季戊四醇，是一種烈性炸藥。

sentences.english: But it won't go to your head, as most liquors do.
sentences.chinese: 但是它不像大多數烈性酒那樣喝了會頭暈。

sentences.english: Since you have no spirit, I have to settle for beer.
sentences.chinese: 既然你沒有烈性酒，我就喝點啤酒吧。

sentences.english: I'm not used to strong drink.
The video only dedicate to people who love ferocious dogs .
sentences.chinese: 此片僅僅獻給愛好烈性犬的狗友。

sentences.english: Well, if you really wanna get drunk tonight, I'd stick with the hard stuff.
sentences.chinese: 如果今晚你想大醉，我建議來點烈性酒。

sentences.english: I didn't think of her as the stiff-drink kind.
sentences.chinese: 我不認爲她是那種會喝烈性飲品的人。
今天，聖日耳曼烈性酒遍佈各地。

sentences.english: We have the best brand of wines and spirits.
sentences.chinese: 我們有各種名牌葡萄酒和烈性酒。

sentences.english: Which is more primal, hard cider or a strawberry margarita?
sentences.chinese: 什麼才更原始，烈性蘋果酒還是草莓瑪格麗塔酒？

sentences.english: The flowery liqueur has become a favorite of many bartenders.
sentences.chinese: 這種芬芳的烈性酒受許多調酒師的追捧。

sentences.english: In the day of our king the princes have made him sick with bottles of wine;
sentences.chinese: 在我們王宴樂的日子，首領因酒的烈性成病。

definition: to promote estrus/to bring an animal to heat by artificial means
alcohol/ethanol CH3CH2OH/ethyl alcohol/also written 乙醇/grain alcohol
to cure ills with poison (TCM)/to fight evil with evil/set a thief to catch a thief/to fight fire with fire
